Title: Vincent Van Gogh.

Authors: Jan Greenberg;Sandra Jane Jordan.

Description: Profiles the turbulent life of Vincent van Gogh from his birth in the Netherlands, through his attempts to be a clergyman, to his years of painting, and finally, to his death in Auvers-sur-Oise near Paris. An ALA Notable Book. Reprint..
